> f58c525921d0419086d6
	Category_Name: Renew Visa
	Category_Description: Request for visa renewal for an employee.
	Attribute:
		> dad8e1dbc697464494d6
			Entity_Name: visa_type
			Description: The type of visa for which renewal is requested.

		> d01cac1a412f4208bb08
			Entity_Name: renewal_duration
			Description: The duration for which the visa is to be renewed.
			Possible_values: ['1 year', '2 years', '3 years']

		> ca56df5c1fb647bfafd9
			Entity_Name: employee_name
			Description: Name of the employee for whom the visa renewal is requested.
			Possible_values: ['John Doe', 'Jane Smith', 'Alice Johnson']



> 3e648eb00e824f33ac67

	Category_Description: Check the current status of a visa sponsorship application.
	Attribute:
		> 7f74b62a3d144dd88e1e
			Entity_Name: application_id
			Description: The unique identifier for the visa sponsorship application.
			Possible_values: ['A123456', 'B789012', 'C345678']

		> 1d33f49c8e864e5a9781
			Entity_Name: application_date
			Description: The date when the visa sponsorship application was submitted.



> 2bf0dd69840e4ed994ce
	Category_Name: Denied Application

		> 9c524432b5a1415c8d30
			Entity_Name: visa_type
			Description: The type of visa that was applied for.

		> 740eb1c14d494207869e
			Entity_Name: denial_reason
			Description: The reason for the denial of the visa sponsorship application.
